name: I Just Want to Survive
description:
Grab the cloud to avoid all the bad things such as skyscrapers, airplanes, meteorites...
Collect flowers to unlock new skins :)

How to play :

Grab the cloud by left click it with your mouse, or use WASD / Arrows keys to move him.

Made by Grizzly Cogs (https://grizzlycogs.bandcamp.com/) during the lockdown :)

Get the soundtrack here : http://grizzlygames.bandcamp.com/
